_meanings:
{@--4@} To spring back,
rebound (as a bow.)

{@--5@} To spring
or break forth, shoot out, spring up,
rise forth; {#DarmataHsPurati nirmalaM yaSaH#};
<ls>Ku. 3. 68.</ls>

{@--9@} To flash on the mind, rush
suddenly into memory.

{@--1@} To cause to throb or vibrate.
{@--2@} To cause to shine, irradiate.
{@--3@} To throw, cast. --WITH {#apa#} to
shine forth or out.
